name: Falls to Paradise – Waterfall Tour
description: Falls to Paradise is an all-inclusive day tour exploring Cedar Creek Falls where guests can swim in the rockpools at waterfalls, surrounded by tropical flora and fauna. Follow this with a chill-out session around the iconic Northerlies Beach Bar & Grill and enjoy the spectacular scenery of the Coral Sea and Whitsunday Islands. This is a great all-around day to enjoy with family and friends.
includes: All-inclusive day tour, guided tour, access to Northerlies Beach Bar & Grill
highlights:
Cedar Creek Falls
Northerlies Beach Bar & Grill
Coral Sea
Whitsunday Islands
Tropical flora and fauna

name: The Purrfect 2 Days
description: The Purrfect 2 days is the ultimate way to explore all the Whitsundays offers. This package has it all, from the purest white sand in the world to the sunset sailing. Discover some of Whitsunday’s best-kept secrets with Red Cat Adventures over any 2 days of your choice.
includes: 2 day tours, sunset sailing, visits to Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet lookout, 2 snorkelling opportunities on the Great Barrier Reef
highlights:
Whitehaven Beach
Hill Inlet lookout
Snorkelling on the Great Barrier Reef
Sunset sailing
Langford Island

name: Thundercat Whitsundays – All Inclusive Day Tour
description: Get ready for a fun day out on the water! Cruise to Langford, a stunning island paradise, and enjoy activities like banana boat rides and snorkelling. Relax on the spacious deck, savour a delicious lunch, and catch an epic sunset as we sail back to Airlie Beach.
departure_times: Return sunset sail to Airlie Beach approx 2.5 hours
includes: Snorkel equipment (mask and snorkel only), delicious lunch, snacks, BYO alcohol with eski and ice provided, return sunset sail
highlights:
Cruise to Langford Island
Snorkelling among vibrant reefs
Banana boat rides
Epic sunset sail
Stunning views
Humpback Whale sightings (June to September)

name: The Purrfect 2 Days
description: Discover the Whitsundays in style with The Purrfect 2 Days package, the ultimate way to explore all the Whitsundays has to offer. From the purest white sand to sunset sailing, this adventure includes two national award-winning all-inclusive day tours, Thundercat and the Tongarra Day Sail.
includes: 2 all-inclusive day tours, Thundercat and Tongarra Day Sail, snorkelling opportunities, visit to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet lookout
highlights:
Whitehaven Beach
Hill Inlet lookout
Great Barrier Reef snorkeling
Sunset sailing

name: Tongarra Day Sailing Tour
description: Get ready for a fun day out on the water with our Tongarra Day Sailing Tour! Cruise to Langford Island, enjoy thrilling activities like banana boat rides and snorkeling, and relax on the spacious deck with comfy beanbags. Join us for an unforgettable adventure, complete with a delicious lunch and a scenic sunset sail back to Airlie Beach.
departure_times: Return sunset sail to Airlie Beach approx 2.5 hours
includes: Delicious snacks, freshly prepared lunch, snorkel equipment (mask and snorkel only), BYO alcohol (eski and ice provided)
highlights:
Visit Langford Island
Banana boat rides
Snorkeling among vibrant reefs
Relax on the deck with beanbags
Sunset sail to Airlie Beach
See Humpback Whales (June to September)

name: Thundercat Whitsundays – All Inclusive Day Tour
description: Thundercat offers an exhilarating ride around the Whitsunday Islands all in one day, visiting the world-famous Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet lookout. Experience two snorkelling opportunities on the fringing Great Barrier Reef with an all-inclusive package that's perfect for families, couples, and groups.
includes: Lycra suit, snorkelling equipment, wet suit (winter months), on-board toilet, lunch and snacks, local bus transfers, eski and ice for BYO alcohol
highlights:
Whitehaven Beach
Hill Inlet Lookout
Two snorkelling locations on the Great Barrier Reef
North and South end of the Whitsunday Islands
Guided bush walk
locations: Airlie Beach,Great Barrier Reef,Hill Inlet,Whitehaven,Whitsunday Island

name: Great Barrier Reef Snorkel Adventure
description: Experience the beauty of the world-famous Great Barrier Reef on this snorkelling eco-adventure. Travel on the smoothest, most comfortable vessel to visit the incredible coral wonderland of the outer reefs. Snorkel, relax with a delicious locally catered lunch, and take in the sights and sounds of the natural world from the top deck.
includes: Free courtesy bus transfers, lunch and snacks catered by local chefs, lycra suits, snorkelling equipment, wet suits (winter months), fully licenced bar
highlights:
Snorkel the world-famous Great Barrier Reef
360° rooftop deck for panoramic views
Travel in style aboard our fully air-conditioned vessel
Ride through the iconic Whitsunday Islands
Travel with accredited Climate Action Leaders

name: Thundercat Whitsundays – All Inclusive Day Tour
description: Adventure with Australia’s BEST! Thundercat offers the 'Adventure of a lifetime' around the Whitsunday Islands in one day, visiting the world-famous Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet lookout, and snorkeling on the fringing Great Barrier Reef. Perfect for travelers concerned about seasickness, this tour combines stability, speed, and stunning views.
includes: Visit to Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet lookout, 2 snorkels on the Great Barrier Reef
